attributes.action: Allow the transport of pets (under 10kg) entering in the UK, in the cabin air.
attributes.background: Pets are a member of family. I often travel between Italy and Uk and I don't understand why I can't bring my cat with me in the cabin air from Italy to Uk, but I have to pay almost 800pounds and bring it by cargo. This is very stressful for the pet and too expensive to do at any travel.
